doc.title: Behind the Eyes of War
doc.plot: Tells the story of how television news professionals deal with the complexities of working in the worlds most dangerous environments, how it affects their lives and the lives of others. It attempts to explain what it takes for a person to go and report news, to the world, from combat areas. The film incorporates real war zone footage, and includes terrifying images shot during an air attack in Tchetcheynia from which the director and his BBC colleagues barely managed to escape with their lives..
